files.patch:
@@ -922,5 +922,3 @@
-# MACOSX_METAL_VERSION_MIN specifies the lowest version of macOS
-# that should be used to compile Metal shaders. We support Metal
-# pipeline only on macOS >=10.14. For macOS versions <10.14 even if
-# we enable Metal pipeline using -Dsun.java2d.metal=true, at
-# runtime we force it to use OpenGL pipeline.
+# MACOSX_METAL_VERSION_MIN specifies the lowest version of macOS that
+# should be used to compile Metal shaders. Metal uses the same minimum
+# version as the rest of the JDK.
